document.full_text: ugandan opposition leader kizza besigye was dragged from his car at gunpoint by police on thursday and thrown into a pickup truck during a fifth round of protests against high food and fuel prices.
document.title: ugandan opposition leader detained for fourth time
lines_and_colors: ugandan opposition leader kizza besigye was dragged from his car at gunpoint by police on thursday and thrown into a pickup truck during a fifth round of protests against high food and fuel prices.
